# avom R package

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/alesvomacka/avom/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/alesvomacka/avom/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

This is a personal package with functions for data analysis and visualization.

## Installation

You can install the development version of avom from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("alesvomacka/avom")
```
